snippet.title: Surviving the Aftermath - Teaser
snippet.description:
Introducing Surviving the Aftermath, the next Surviving game launching in late 2020 on Epic Games Store, Steam, Xbox One, and PlayStation® 4. Available soon in Early Access on the Epic Games Store and Xbox Game Preview.

Learn more about Surviving the Aftermath during the PDXCON 2019 Announcement Show, broadcasted live on October 19th at 10:00 AM CEST on twitch.tv/paradoxinteractive

Paradox on YouTube:
---------------------------------
ParadoxInteractive - http://youtube.com/ParadoxInteractive
Trailers, Feature Breakdowns, Dev Diaries, and more.

ParadoxExtra - http://youtube.com/ParadoxExtra
Gameplay of our video games, convention coverage, and other fun things from Paradox!

Paradox Grand Strategy - http://youtube.com/ParadoxGrandStrategy
Gameplay of our Grand Strategy Games. CK2, EU4, HOI4, Stellaris, and Imperator.
